00108         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00109         OgreOggSoundManager::~OgreOggSoundManager()
00110         {
00111 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00112                 mShuttingDown = true;
00113                 if (mUpdateThread)
00114                 {
00115                         mUpdateThread->join();
00116                         OGRE_FREE(mUpdateThread, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00117                         mUpdateThread = 0;
00118                 }
00119                 if ( mActionsList ) delete mActionsList;
00120 #endif
00121 
00122                 _releaseAll();
00123 
00124                 if ( mRecorder ) OGRE_DELETE_T(mRecorder, OgreOggSoundRecord, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00125 
00126                 alcMakeContextCurrent(0);
00127                 alcDestroyContext(mContext);
00128                 alcCloseDevice(mDevice);
00129 
00130                 OGRE_DELETE_T(mListener, OgreOggListener, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00131         }

00139         OgreOggSoundManager& OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton(void)

00142                 assert( ms_Singleton );  return ( *ms_Singleton );
00143         }
00144         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00145         bool OgreOggSoundManager::init(const std::string &deviceName, unsigned int maxSources)
00146         {
00147                 if (mDevice) return true;
00148 
00149                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*****************************************");
00150                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Initialising OgreOggSound --- ***");
00151                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** ---     "+OGREOGGSOUND_VERSION_STRING+"     --- ***");
00152                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*****************************************");
00153 
00154                 // Set source limit
00155                 mMaxSources = maxSources;
00156 
00157                 // Get an internal list of audio device strings
00158                 _enumDevices();
00159 
00160                 int majorVersion;
00161                 int minorVersion;
00162 
00163                 // Version Info
00164                 alcGetIntegerv(NULL, ALC_MAJOR_VERSION, sizeof(majorVersion), &majorVersion);
00165                 if (alGetError()) throw std::string("Unable to get OpenAL Major Version number");
00166                 alcGetIntegerv(NULL, ALC_MINOR_VERSION, sizeof(minorVersion), &minorVersion);
00167                 if (alGetError()) throw std::string("Unable to get OpenAL Minor Version number");
00168                 Ogre::String msg="*** --- OpenAL version " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(majorVersion) + "." + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(minorVersion);
00169                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
00170 
00171                 /*
00172                 ** OpenAL versions prior to 1.0 DO NOT support device enumeration, so we
00173                 ** need to test the current version and decide if we should try to find
00174                 ** an appropriate device or if we should just open the default device.
00175                 */
00176                 bool deviceInList = false;
00177                 if(majorVersion >= 1 && minorVersion >= 1)
00178                 {
00179                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- AVAILABLE DEVICES --- ***");
00180 
00181                         // List devices in log and see if the sugested device is in the list
00182                         Ogre::StringVector deviceList = getDeviceList();
00183                         std::stringstream ss;
00184                         Ogre::StringVector::iterator deviceItr;
00185                         for(deviceItr = deviceList.begin(); deviceItr != deviceList.end() && (*deviceItr).compare("") != 0; deviceItr++)
00186                         {
00187                                 deviceInList |= (*deviceItr).compare(deviceName) == 0;
00188                                 ss << "*** --- " << (*deviceItr);
00189                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(ss.str());
00190                                 ss.clear(); ss.str("");
00191                         }
00192                 }
00193 
00194                 // If the suggested device is in the list we use it, otherwise select the default device
00195                 mDevice = alcOpenDevice(deviceInList ? deviceName.c_str() : NULL);
00196                 if (!mDevice)
00197                         throw std::string("Unable to create OpenAL device");
00198 
00199                 if (!deviceInList)
00200                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Choosing: " + Ogre::String(alcGetString(mDevice, ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER))+" (Default device)");
00201                 else
00202                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Choosing: " + Ogre::String(alcGetString(mDevice, ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER)));
00203 
00204                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OpenAL Device successfully created");
00205 
00206 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00207                 ALint attribs[2] = {ALC_MAX_AUXILIARY_SENDS, 4};
00208 
00209                 mContext = alcCreateContext(mDevice, attribs);
00210                 if (!mContext)
00211                         throw std::string("Unable to create OpenAL context");
00212 
00213                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OpenAL Context successfully created");
00214 
00215                 if (!alcMakeContextCurrent(mContext))
00216                         throw std::string("Unable to set current OpenAL context");
00217 #endif
00218 
00219                 _checkFeatureSupport();
00220 
00221                 mListener = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggListener, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)();
00222 
00223                 mNumSources = _createSourcePool();
00224 
00225                 msg="*** --- Created " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(mNumSources) + " sources for simultaneous sounds";
00226                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
00227 
00228 #       if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00229                 mUpdateThread = OGRE_NEW_T(boost::thread,Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(boost::function0<void>(&OgreOggSoundManager::threadUpdate));
00230                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Using BOOST threads for streaming");
00231                 mActionsList = new LocklessQueue<SoundAction>(32);
00232 #       endif
00233 
00234 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00235                 // Recording
00236                 if (alcIsExtensionPresent(mDevice, "ALC_EXT_CAPTURE") == AL_FALSE)
00237                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Recording devices NOT detected!");
00238                 else
00239                 {
00240                         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- Recording devices available:");
00241                         OgreOggSoundRecord* r=0;
00242                         if ( r=createRecorder() )
00243                         {
00244                                 OgreOggSoundRecord::RecordDeviceList list=r->getCaptureDeviceList();
00245                                 for ( OgreOggSoundRecord::RecordDeviceList::iterator iter=list.begin(); iter!=list.end(); ++iter )
00246                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- '"+(*iter)+"'");
00247                                 OGRE_DELETE_T(r, OgreOggSoundRecord, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00248                         }
00249                 }
00250 #endif
00251                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*****************************************");
00252                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** ---  OgreOggSound Initialised --- ***");
00253                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*****************************************");
00254 
00255                 return true;
00256         }
00257 
00258         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00259         const StringVector OgreOggSoundManager::getDeviceList() const
00260         {
00261                 const ALCchar* deviceList = alcGetString(NULL, ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER);
00262 
00263                 Ogre::StringVector deviceVector;
00264                 /*
00265                 ** The list returned by the call to alcGetString has the names of the
00266                 ** devices seperated by NULL characters and the list is terminated by
00267                 ** two NULL characters, so we can cast the list into a string and it
00268                 ** will automatically stop at the first NULL that it sees, then we
00269                 ** can move the pointer ahead by the lenght of that string + 1 and we
00270                 ** will be at the begining of the next string.  Once we hit an empty
00271                 ** string we know that we've found the double NULL that terminates the
00272                 ** list and we can stop there.
00273                 */
00274                 while(*deviceList != 0)
00275                 {
00276                         try
00277                         {
00278                                 ALCdevice *device = alcOpenDevice(deviceList);
00279                                 if (alcGetError(device)) throw std::string("Unable to open device");
00280 
00281                                 if(device)
00282                                 {
00283                                         // Device seems to be valid
00284                                         ALCcontext *context = alcCreateContext(device, NULL);
00285                                         if (alcGetError(device)) throw std::string("Unable to create context");
00286                                         if(context)
00287                                         {
00288                                                 // Context seems to be valid
00289                                                 alcMakeContextCurrent(context);
00290                                                 if(alcGetError(device)) throw std::string("Unable to make context current");
00291                                                 deviceVector.push_back(alcGetString(device, ALC_DEVICE_SPECIFIER));
00292                                                 alcMakeContextCurrent(NULL);
00293                                                 if(alcGetError(device)) throw std::string("Unable to clear current context");
00294                                                 alcDestroyContext(context);
00295                                                 if(alcGetError(device)) throw std::string("Unable to destroy current context");
00296                                         }
00297                                         alcCloseDevice(device);
00298                                 }
00299                         }
00300                         catch(...)
00301                         {
00302                                 // Don't die here, we'll just skip this device.
00303                         }
00304 
00305                         deviceList += strlen(deviceList) + 1;
00306                 }
00307 
00308                 return deviceVector;
00309         }
00310         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00311         const StringVector OgreOggSoundManager::getSoundList() const
00312         { 
00313                 StringVector list;
00314                 for ( SoundMap::const_iterator iter=mSoundMap.begin(); iter!=mSoundMap.end(); ++iter )
00315                         list.push_back((*iter).first);
00316                 return list; 
00317         }

00322                         alListenerf(AL_GAIN, vol);
00323         }

00325         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00326         ALfloat OgreOggSoundManager::getMasterVolume()
00327         {
00328                 ALfloat vol=0.0;
00329                 alGetListenerf(AL_GAIN, &vol);
00330                 return vol;

00332         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00333         OgreOggISound* OgreOggSoundManager::createSound(const std::string& name, const std::string& file, bool stream, bool loop, bool preBuffer)
00334         {
00335                 Ogre::ResourceGroupManager* groupManager = 0;
00336                 Ogre::String group;
00337                 Ogre::DataStreamPtr soundData;
00338                 ALuint buffer = AL_NONE;
00339 
00340                 // Can we share a buffer?
00341                 // Static sounds only...
00342                 if ( !stream )
00343                 {
00344                         // Get shared buffer if available
00345                         if ( (buffer = _getSharedBuffer(file)) == AL_NONE )
00346                         {
00347                                 // Not available - try finding resource in OGRE resources
00348                                 groupManager = Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00349 
00350                                 try
00351                                 {
00352                                         group = groupManager->findGroupContainingResource(file);
00353                                         soundData = groupManager->openResource(file, group);
00354                                 }
00355                                 catch (...)
00356                                 {
00357                                         // Cannot find sound file
00358                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Unable to find sound file! have you specified a resource location?", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00359                                         return (0);
00360                                 }
00361                         }
00362                 }
00363                 // Streamed sound - find resource in OGRE resources list
00364                 else
00365                 {
00366                         groupManager = Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00367 
00368                         try
00369                         {
00370                                 group = groupManager->findGroupContainingResource(file);
00371                                 soundData = groupManager->openResource(file, group);
00372                         }
00373                         catch (...)
00374                         {
00375                                 // Cannot find sound file
00376                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Unable to find sound file! have you specified a resource location?", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00377                                 return (0);
00378                         }
00379                 }
00380                 if              (file.find(".ogg") != std::string::npos || file.find(".OGG") != std::string::npos)
00381                 {
00382                         // MUST be unique
00383                         if ( mSoundMap.find(name)!=mSoundMap.end() )
00384                         {
00385                                 Ogre::String msg="*** OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Sound with name: "+name+" already exists!";
00386                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
00387                                 return 0;
00388                         }
00389 
00390                         if(stream)
00391                                 mSoundMap[name] = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggStreamSound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(name);
00392                         else
00393                                 mSoundMap[name] = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggStaticSound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(name);
00394 
00395                         // Set loop flag
00396                         mSoundMap[name]->loop(loop);
00397 
00398 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00399                         SoundAction action;
00400                         cSound* c               = OGRE_NEW_T(cSound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00401                         c->mFileName    = file;
00402                         c->mBuffer              = buffer;
00403                         c->mStream              = soundData;
00404                         action.mAction  = LQ_LOAD;
00405                         action.mParams  = c;
00406                         action.mSound   = mSoundMap[name];
00407                         _requestSoundAction(action);
00408 #else
00409                         // Use shared buffer if available
00410                         if ( buffer!=AL_NONE )
00411                                 _loadSoundImpl(mSoundMap[name], file, buffer, preBuffer);
00412                         else
00413                                 _loadSoundImpl(mSoundMap[name], soundData, preBuffer);
00414                                 // Load audio file
00415 #endif
00416                         return mSoundMap[name];
00417                 }
00418                 else if (file.find(".wav") != std::string::npos || file.find(".WAV") != std::string::npos)
00419                 {
00420                         // MUST be unique
00421                         if ( mSoundMap.find(name)!=mSoundMap.end() )
00422                         {
00423                                 Ogre::String msg="*** OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Sound with name: "+name+" already exists!";
00424                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
00425                                 return 0;
00426                         }
00427 
00428                         if(stream)
00429                                 mSoundMap[name] = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggStreamWavSound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(name);
00430                         else
00431                                 mSoundMap[name] = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggStaticWavSound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(name);
00432 
00433                         // Set loop flag
00434                         mSoundMap[name]->loop(loop);
00435 
00436 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00437                         SoundAction action;
00438                         cSound* c               = OGRE_NEW_T(cSound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00439                         c->mFileName    = file;
00440                         c->mBuffer              = buffer;
00441                         c->mStream              = soundData;
00442                         action.mAction  = LQ_LOAD;
00443                         action.mParams  = c;
00444                         action.mSound   = mSoundMap[name];
00445                         _requestSoundAction(action);
00446 #else
00447                         // Use shared buffer if available
00448                         if ( buffer!=AL_NONE )
00449                                 _loadSoundImpl(mSoundMap[name], file, buffer, preBuffer);
00450                         else
00451                                 _loadSoundImpl(mSoundMap[name], soundData, preBuffer);
00452                                 // Load audio file
00453 #endif
00454                         return mSoundMap[name];
00455                 }
00456                 else
00457                 {
00458                         Ogre::String msg="*** OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Sound does not have .ogg extension: "+name;
00459                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
00460                         return NULL;
00461                 }
00462         }

00464         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00465         OgreOggISound* OgreOggSoundManager::createSound(SceneManager& scnMgr, const std::string& name, const std::string& file, bool stream, bool loop, bool preBuffer)
00466         {
00467                 Ogre::NameValuePairList params;
00468                 params["fileName"]      = file;
00469                 params["stream"]        = stream        ? "true" : "false";
00470                 params["loop"]          = loop          ? "true" : "false";
00471                 params["preBuffer"]     = preBuffer ? "true" : "false";
00472 
00473                 OgreOggISound* sound = 0;
00474 
00475                 // Catch exception when plugin hasn't been registered
00476                 try
00477                 {
00478                         sound = static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(scnMgr.createMovableObject( name, OgreOggSoundFactory::FACTORY_TYPE_NAME, &params ));
00479                         sound->mScnMan = &scnMgr;
00480                 }
00481                 catch (...)
00482                 {
00483                         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- createSound() - OgreOggSound plugin not loaded.");
00484                 }
00485                 // create Movable Sound
00486                 return sound;
00487         }

00489         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00490         OgreOggISound* OgreOggSoundManager::getSound(const std::string& name)
00491         {
00492                 SoundMap::iterator i = mSoundMap.find(name);
00493                 if(i == mSoundMap.end()) return 0;
00494                 return i->second;
00495         }

00498         {
00499                 SoundMap::iterator i = mSoundMap.find(name);
00500                 if(i == mSoundMap.end()) return false; return true;
00501         }

00557         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00558         void OgreOggSoundManager::destroySound(const Ogre::String& sName)
00559         {
00560                 OgreOggISound* sound=0;
00561                 if ( !(sound = getSound(sName)) ) return;
00562 
00563 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00564                 SoundAction action;
00565                 action.mAction  = LQ_DESTROY;
00566                 action.mSound   = sound;
00567                 action.mParams  = 0;
00568                 _requestSoundAction(action);
00569 #else
00570                 _destroySoundImpl(sound);
00571 #endif
00572         }

00598         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00599         void OgreOggSoundManager::setDopplerFactor(Ogre::Real factor)
00600         {
00601                 alDopplerFactor(factor);
00602         }
00603         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00604         void OgreOggSoundManager::update(Ogre::Real fTime)
00605         {
00606                 static Real rTime=0.f;
00607 
00608                 // Update ALL active sounds
00609                 ActiveList::iterator i = mActiveSounds.begin();
00610                 while( i != mActiveSounds.end() )
00611                 {
00612                         (*i)->update(fTime);
00613         #if !OGGSOUND_THREADED 
00614                         (*i)->_updateAudioBuffers();
00615         #endif
00616                         ++i;
00617                 }
00618 
00619                 // Limit re-activation
00620                 if ( (rTime+=fTime) > 0.1 )
00621                 {
00622                         // try to reactivate any
00623                         _reactivateQueuedSounds();
00624 
00625                         // Reset timer
00626                         rTime=0.f;
00627                 }
00628 
00629                 // Update listener
00630                 mListener->update();
00631         }
00632         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00633         struct OgreOggSoundManager::_sortNearToFar
00634         {
00635                 bool operator()(OgreOggISound* sound1, OgreOggISound* sound2)
00636                 {
00637                         Real    d1=0.f,
00638                                         d2=0.f;
00639                         Vector3 lPos=OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().getListener()->getPosition();
00640 
00641                         if ( sound1->isRelativeToListener() )
00642                                 d1 = sound1->getPosition().length();
00643                         else
00644                                 d1 = sound1->getPosition().distance(lPos);
00645 
00646                         if ( sound2->isRelativeToListener() )
00647                                 d2 = sound2->getPosition().length();
00648                         else
00649                                 d2 = sound2->getPosition().distance(lPos);
00650 
00651                         // Check sort order
00652                         if ( d1<d2 )    return true;
00653                         if ( d1>d2 )    return false;
00654 
00655                         // Equal - don't sort
00656                         return false;
00657                 }
00658         };
00659         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00660         struct OgreOggSoundManager::_sortFarToNear
00661         {
00662                 bool operator()(OgreOggISound* sound1, OgreOggISound* sound2)
00663                 {
00664                         Real    d1=0.f,
00665                                         d2=0.f;
00666                         Vector3 lPos=OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().getListener()->getPosition();
00667 
00668                         if ( sound1->isRelativeToListener() )
00669                                 d1 = sound1->getPosition().length();
00670                         else
00671                                 d1 = sound1->getPosition().distance(lPos);
00672 
00673                         if ( sound2->isRelativeToListener() )
00674                                 d2 = sound2->getPosition().length();
00675                         else
00676                                 d2 = sound2->getPosition().distance(lPos);
00677 
00678                         // Check sort order
00679                         if ( d1>d2 )    return true;
00680                         if ( d1<d2 )    return false;
00681 
00682                         // Equal - don't sort
00683                         return false;
00684                 }
00685         };
00686         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00687         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_requestSoundSource(OgreOggISound* sound)
00688         {
00689                 // Does sound need a source?
00690                 if (!sound) return false;
00691 
00692                 if (sound->getSource()!=AL_NONE) return true;
00693 
00694                 ALuint src = AL_NONE;
00695 
00696                 // If there are still sources available
00697                 // Pop next available off list
00698                 if ( !mSourcePool.empty() )
00699                 {
00700                         // Get next available source
00701                         src = static_cast<ALuint>(mSourcePool.back());
00702                         // Remove from available list
00703                         mSourcePool.pop_back();
00704                         // Set sounds source
00705                         sound->setSource(src);
00706                         // Add to active list
00707                         mActiveSounds.push_back(sound);
00708                         // Remove from reactivate list if reactivating..
00709                         if ( !mSoundsToReactivate.empty() )
00710                         {
00711                                 for ( ActiveList::iterator rIter=mSoundsToReactivate.begin(); rIter!=mSoundsToReactivate.end(); )
00712                                 {
00713                                         if ( (*rIter)==sound )
00714                                                 rIter = mSoundsToReactivate.erase(rIter);
00715                                         else
00716                                                 ++rIter;
00717                                 }
00718                         }
00719                         return true;
00720                 }
00721                 // All sources in use
00722                 // Re-use an active source
00723                 // Use either a non-playing source or a lower priority source
00724                 else
00725                 {
00726                         // Get iterator for list
00727                         ActiveList::iterator iter = mActiveSounds.begin();
00728 
00729                         // Search for a stopped sound
00730                         while ( iter!=mActiveSounds.end() )
00731                         {
00732                                 // Find a stopped sound - reuse its source
00733                                 if ( (*iter)->isStopped() )
00734                                 {
00735                                         ALuint src = (*iter)->getSource();
00736                                         ALuint nullSrc = AL_NONE;
00737                                         // Pause sounds
00738                                         (*iter)->pause();
00739                                         // Remove source
00740                                         (*iter)->setSource(nullSrc);
00741                                         // Attach source to new sound
00742                                         sound->setSource(src);
00743                                         // Add to reactivate list
00744                                         mSoundsToReactivate.push_back((*iter));
00745                                         // Remove relinquished sound from active list
00746                                         mActiveSounds.erase(iter);
00747                                         // Add new sound to active list
00748                                         mActiveSounds.push_back(sound);
00749                                         // Return success
00750                                         return true;
00751                                 }
00752                                 else
00753                                         ++iter;
00754                         }
00755 
00756                         // Check priority...
00757                         Ogre::uint8 priority = sound->getPriority();
00758                         iter = mActiveSounds.begin();
00759 
00760                         // Search for a stopped sound
00761                         while ( iter!=mActiveSounds.end() )
00762                         {
00763                                 // Find a stopped sound - reuse its source
00764                                 if ( (*iter)->getPriority()<sound->getPriority() )
00765                                 {
00766                                         ALuint src = (*iter)->getSource();
00767                                         ALuint nullSrc = AL_NONE;
00768                                         // Pause sounds
00769                                         (*iter)->pause();
00770                                         // Remove source
00771                                         (*iter)->setSource(nullSrc);
00772                                         // Attach source to new sound
00773                                         sound->setSource(src);
00774                                         // Add to reactivate list
00775                                         mSoundsToReactivate.push_back((*iter));
00776                                         // Remove relinquished sound from active list
00777                                         mActiveSounds.erase(iter);
00778                                         // Add new sound to active list
00779                                         mActiveSounds.push_back(sound);
00780                                         // Return success
00781                                         return true;
00782                                 }
00783                                 else
00784                                         ++iter;
00785                         }
00786 
00787                         // Sort by distance
00788                         Real    d1 = 0.f,
00789                                         d2 = 0.f;
00790 
00791                         // Sort list by distance
00792                         std::sort(mActiveSounds.begin(), mActiveSounds.end(), _sortFarToNear());
00793 
00794                         // Lists should be sorted:      Active-->furthest to Nearest
00795                         //                                                      Reactivate-->Nearest to furthest
00796                         OgreOggISound* snd1 = mActiveSounds.front();
00797 
00798                         if ( snd1->isRelativeToListener() )
00799                                 d1 = snd1->getPosition().length();
00800                         else
00801                                 d1 = snd1->getPosition().distance(mListener->getPosition());
00802 
00803                         if ( sound->isRelativeToListener() )
00804                                 d1 = sound->getPosition().length();
00805                         else
00806                                 d1 = sound->getPosition().distance(mListener->getPosition());
00807 
00808                         // Needs swapping?
00809                         if ( d1>d2 )
00810                         {
00811                                 ALuint src = snd1->getSource();
00812                                 ALuint nullSrc = AL_NONE;
00813                                 // Pause sounds
00814                                 snd1->pause();
00815                                 snd1->_markPlayPosition();
00816                                 // Remove source
00817                                 snd1->setSource(nullSrc);
00818                                 // Attach source to new sound
00819                                 sound->setSource(src);
00820                                 sound->_recoverPlayPosition();
00821                                 // Add to reactivate list
00822                                 mSoundsToReactivate.push_back(snd1);
00823                                 // Remove relinquished sound from active list
00824                                 mActiveSounds.erase(mActiveSounds.begin());
00825                                 // Add new sound to active list
00826                                 mActiveSounds.push_back(sound);
00827                                 // Return success
00828                                 return true;
00829                         }
00830                 }
00831                 // Uh oh - won't be played
00832                 return false;
00833         }
00834 
00835         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00836         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_releaseSoundSource(OgreOggISound* sound)
00837         {
00838                 if (!sound) return false;
00839 
00840                 if (sound->getSource()==AL_NONE) return true;
00841 
00842                 // Get source
00843                 ALuint src = sound->getSource();
00844 
00845                 // Valid source?
00846                 if(src!=AL_NONE)
00847                 {
00848                         ALuint source=AL_NONE;
00849 
00850                         // Detach source from sound
00851                         sound->setSource(source);
00852 
00853                         // Make source available
00854                         mSourcePool.push_back(src);
00855 
00856                         // Remove from actives list
00857                         for ( ActiveList::iterator iter=mActiveSounds.begin(); iter!=mActiveSounds.end(); )
00858                         {
00859                                 // Find sound in actives list
00860                                 if ( (*iter)==sound )
00861                                 {
00862                                         // Remove from list
00863                                         iter = mActiveSounds.erase(iter);
00864                                 }
00865                                 else
00866                                         ++iter;
00867                         }
00868                         return true;
00869                 }
00870 
00871                 return false;
00872         }

00878                 return false;

00915         bool OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXEffectParameter(const std::string& eName, ALint effectType, ALenum attrib, ALfloat param)
00916         {

00918 
00919                 ALuint effect;
00920 
00921                 // Get effect id's
00922                 if ( (effect = _getEFXEffect(eName) ) != AL_EFFECT_NULL )
00923                 {
00924                         alGetError();
00925                         alEffecti(effectType, attrib, param);
00926                         if ( alGetError()!=AL_NO_ERROR )
00927                         {
00928                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXEffectParameter() - Unable to change effect parameter!");
00929                                 return false;
00930                         }
00931                 }
00932 
00933                 return false;
00934         }

01002         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01003         bool OgreOggSoundManager::attachEffectToSound(const std::string& sName, ALuint slotID, const Ogre::String& effectName, const Ogre::String& filterName)
01004         {
01005                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() && sName.empty() ) return false;
01006 
01007                 ALuint effect;
01008                 ALuint filter;
01009                 ALuint slot;
01010 
01011                 // Get effect id's
01012                 slot    = _getEFXSlot(slotID);
01013                 effect  = _getEFXEffect(effectName);
01014                 filter  = _getEFXFilter(filterName);
01015 
01016                 // Attach effect and filter to slot
01017                 if ( _attachEffectToSlot(slot, effect) )
01018                 {
01019                         OgreOggISound* sound = getSound(sName);
01020 
01021                         if ( sound )
01022                         {
01023                                 ALuint src = sound->getSource();
01024                                 if ( src!=AL_NONE )
01025                                 {
01026                                         alSource3i(src, AL_AUXILIARY_SEND_FILTER, effect, slotID, filter);
01027                                         if (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR)
01028                                         {
01029                                                 return true;
01030                                         }
01031                                         else
01032                                         {
01033                                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::attachEffectToSound() - Unable to attach effect to source!");
01034                                                 return false;
01035                                         }
01036                                 }
01037                                 else
01038                                 {
01039                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::attachEffectToSound() - sound has no source!");
01040                                         return false;
01041                                 }
01042                         }
01043                         else
01044                         {
01045                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::attachEffectToSound() - sound not found!");
01046                                 return false;
01047                         }
01048                 }
01049                 return false;
01050         }
01051

01070                                         {
01071                                                 return true;
01072                                         }
01073                                         else
01074                                         {

01083                                 }
01084                         }
01085                         else
01086                         {
01087                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::attachFilterToSound() - sound not found!");
01088                                 return false;
01089                         }
01090 
01091                 }
01092                 return false;
01093         }

01129                                         return false;

01132                         else
01133                         {
01134                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::detachEffectFromSound() - sound not found!");
01135                                 return false;
01136                         }

01154                                 if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01155                                 {

01157                                         return false;
01158                                 }
01159                         }
01160                         else

01163                                 return false;

01165                 }
01166                 else
01167                 {
01168                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::detachFilterFromSound() - sound not found!");
01169                         return false;
01170                 }

01174 
01175         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01176         bool OgreOggSoundManager::createEFXFilter(const std::string& fName, ALint filterType, ALfloat gain, ALfloat hfGain)
01177         {
01178                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() || fName.empty() || !isEffectSupported(filterType) )
01179                 {
01180                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::createEFXFilter() - Unsupported filter!");
01181                         return false;
01182                 }
01183 
01184                 ALuint filter;
01185 
01186                 alGenFilters(1, &filter);
01187                 if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01188                 {
01189                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Cannot create EFX Filter!");
01190                         return false;
01191                 }
01192 
01193                 if (alIsFilter(filter) && ((filterType==AL_FILTER_LOWPASS) || (filterType==AL_FILTER_HIGHPASS) || (filterType==AL_FILTER_BANDPASS) ))
01194                 {
01195                         alFilteri(filter, AL_FILTER_TYPE, filterType);
01196                         if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01197                         {
01198                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Filter not supported!");
01199                                 return false;
01200                         }
01201                         else
01202                         {
01203                                 // Set properties
01204                                 alFilterf(filter, AL_LOWPASS_GAIN, gain);
01205                                 alFilterf(filter, AL_LOWPASS_GAINHF, hfGain);
01206                                 mFilterList[fName]=filter;
01207                         }
01208                 }
01209                 return true;
01210         }
01211 
01212         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01213         bool OgreOggSoundManager::createEFXEffect(const std::string& eName, ALint effectType, EAXREVERBPROPERTIES* props)
01214         {
01215                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() || eName.empty() || !isEffectSupported(effectType) )
01216                 {
01217                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::createEFXEffect() - Unsupported effect!");
01218                         return false;
01219                 }
01220 
01221                 ALuint effect;
01222 
01223                 alGenEffects(1, &effect);
01224                 if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01225                 {
01226                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Cannot create EFX effect!");
01227                         return false;
01228                 }
01229 
01230                 if (alIsEffect(effect))
01231                 {
01232                         alEffecti(effect, AL_EFFECT_TYPE, effectType);
01233                         if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01234                         {
01235                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Effect not supported!");
01236                                 return false;
01237                         }
01238                         else
01239                         {
01240                                 // Apply some preset reverb properties
01241                                 if ( effectType==AL_EFFECT_EAXREVERB  && props )
01242                                 {
01243                                         EFXEAXREVERBPROPERTIES eaxProps;
01244                                         ConvertReverbParameters(props, &eaxProps);
01245                                         _setEAXReverbProperties(&eaxProps, effect);
01246                                 }
01247 
01248                                 // Add to list
01249                                 mEffectList[eName]=effect;
01250                         }
01251                 }
01252                 return true;
01253         }
01254 
01255         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01256         bool OgreOggSoundManager::createEFXSlot()
01257         {
01258                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() )
01259                 {
01260                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::createEFXFilter() - No EFX support!");
01261                         return false;
01262                 }
01263 
01264                 ALuint slot;
01265 
01266                 alGenAuxiliaryEffectSlots(1, &slot);
01267                 if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01268                 {
01269                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Cannot create Auxiliary effect slot!");
01270                         return false;
01271                 }
01272                 else
01273                 {
01274                         mEffectSlotList.push_back(slot);
01275                 }
01276 
01277                 return true;
01278         }
01279 
01280         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01281         int OgreOggSoundManager::getNumberOfSupportedEffectSlots()
01282         {
01283                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() ) return 0;
01284 
01285                 ALint auxSends=0;
01286                 alcGetIntegerv(mDevice, ALC_MAX_AUXILIARY_SENDS, 1, &auxSends);
01287 
01288                 return auxSends;
01289         }

01291         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01292         int OgreOggSoundManager::getNumberOfCreatedEffectSlots()
01293         {
01294                 if ( mEffectSlotList.empty() ) return 0;
01295 
01296                 return static_cast<int>(mEffectSlotList.size());
01297         }

01299         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01300         bool OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXSoundProperties(const std::string& sName, Ogre::Real airAbsorption, Ogre::Real roomRolloff, Ogre::Real coneOuterHF)
01301         {
01302                 OgreOggISound* sound = getSound(sName);
01303 
01304                 if ( sound )
01305                 {
01306                         ALuint src = sound->getSource();
01307 
01308                         if ( src!=AL_NONE )
01309                         {
01310                                 alGetError();
01311 
01312                                 alSourcef(src, AL_AIR_ABSORPTION_FACTOR, airAbsorption);
01313                                 alSourcef(src, AL_ROOM_ROLLOFF_FACTOR, roomRolloff);
01314                                 alSourcef(src, AL_CONE_OUTER_GAINHF, coneOuterHF);
01315 
01316                                 if ( alGetError()==AL_NO_ERROR )
01317                                 {
01318                                         return true;
01319                                 }
01320                                 else
01321                                 {
01322                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXSoundProperties() - Unable to set EFX sound properties!");
01323                                         return false;
01324                                 }
01325                         }
01326                         else
01327                         {
01328                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXSoundProperties() - No source attached to sound!");
01329                                 return false;
01330                         }
01331                 }
01332 
01333                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXSoundProperties() - Sound does not exist!");
01334                 return false;
01335         }
01336         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01337         void OgreOggSoundManager::setEFXDistanceUnits(Ogre::Real units)
01338         {
01339                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() || units<=0 ) return;
01340 
01341                 alListenerf(AL_METERS_PER_UNIT, units);
01342         }
01343 #endif
01344         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01345         void OgreOggSoundManager::_destroyAllSoundsImpl()
01346         {
01347                 // Destroy all sounds
01348                 SoundMap::iterator i = mSoundMap.begin();
01349                 while(i != mSoundMap.end())
01350                 {
01351                         delete i->second;
01352                         ++i;
01353                 }
01354 
01355                 mSoundMap.clear();
01356                 // Shared buffers
01357                 SharedBufferList::iterator b = mSharedBuffers.begin();
01358                 while (b != mSharedBuffers.end())
01359                 {
01360                         if ( b->second->mRefCount>0 )
01361                                 alDeleteBuffers(1, &b->second->mAudioBuffer);
01362                         delete b->second;
01363                         ++b;
01364                 }
01365 
01366                 mSharedBuffers.clear();
01367 
01368                 // Clear queues
01369                 mActiveSounds.clear();
01370                 mPausedSounds.clear();
01371         }
01372         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01373         void OgreOggSoundManager::_stopAllSoundsImpl()
01374         {
01375                 if (mActiveSounds.empty()) return;
01376 
01377                 for (ActiveList::const_iterator iter=mActiveSounds.begin(); iter!=mActiveSounds.end(); ++iter)
01378                 {
01379                         (*iter)->stop();
01380                 }
01381         }
01382         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01383         void OgreOggSoundManager::_pauseAllSoundsImpl()
01384         {
01385                 if (mActiveSounds.empty()) return;
01386 
01387                 for (ActiveList::const_iterator iter=mActiveSounds.begin(); iter!=mActiveSounds.end(); ++iter)
01388                 {
01389                         if ( (*iter)->isPlaying() && !(*iter)->isPaused() )
01390                         {
01391                                 // Pause sound
01392                                 (*iter)->pause();
01393 
01394                                 // Add to list to allow resuming
01395                                 mPausedSounds.push_back((*iter));
01396                         }
01397                 }
01398         }
01399         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01400         void OgreOggSoundManager::_resumeAllPausedSoundsImpl()
01401         {
01402                 if (mPausedSounds.empty()) return;
01403 
01404                 for (ActiveList::const_iterator iter=mPausedSounds.begin(); iter!=mPausedSounds.end(); ++iter)
01405                         (*iter)->play();
01406 
01407                 mPausedSounds.clear();
01408         }
01409         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01410         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_setEAXReverbProperties(EFXEAXREVERBPROPERTIES *pEFXEAXReverb, ALuint uiEffect)
01411         {
01412                 if (pEFXEAXReverb)
01413                 {
01414                         // Clear AL Error code
01415                         alGetError();
01416 
01417                         // Determine type of 'Reverb' effect and apply correct settings
01418                         ALint type;
01419                         alGetEffecti(uiEffect, AL_EFFECT_TYPE, &type);
01420 
01421                         // Apply selected presets to normal reverb
01422                         if ( type==AL_EFFECT_REVERB )
01423                         {
01424                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_DENSITY, pEFXEAXReverb->flDensity);
01425                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_DIFFUSION, pEFXEAXReverb->flDiffusion);
01426                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_GAIN, pEFXEAXReverb->flGain);
01427                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_GAINHF, pEFXEAXReverb->flGainHF);
01428                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_DECAY_TIME, pEFXEAXReverb->flDecayTime);
01429                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_DECAY_HFRATIO, pEFXEAXReverb->flDecayHFRatio);
01430                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_REFLECTIONS_GAIN, pEFXEAXReverb->flReflectionsGain);
01431                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_REFLECTIONS_DELAY, pEFXEAXReverb->flReflectionsDelay);
01432                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_LATE_REVERB_GAIN, pEFXEAXReverb->flLateReverbGain);
01433                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_LATE_REVERB_DELAY, pEFXEAXReverb->flLateReverbDelay);
01434                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_AIR_ABSORPTION_GAINHF, pEFXEAXReverb->flAirAbsorptionGainHF);
01435                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_ROOM_ROLLOFF_FACTOR, pEFXEAXReverb->flRoomRolloffFactor);
01436                                 alEffecti(uiEffect, AL_REVERB_DECAY_HFLIMIT, pEFXEAXReverb->iDecayHFLimit);
01437                         }
01438                         // Apply full EAX reverb settings
01439                         else
01440                         {
01441                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_DENSITY, pEFXEAXReverb->flDensity);
01442                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_DIFFUSION, pEFXEAXReverb->flDiffusion);
01443                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_GAIN, pEFXEAXReverb->flGain);
01444                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_GAINHF, pEFXEAXReverb->flGainHF);
01445                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_GAINLF, pEFXEAXReverb->flGainLF);
01446                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_DECAY_TIME, pEFXEAXReverb->flDecayTime);
01447                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_DECAY_HFRATIO, pEFXEAXReverb->flDecayHFRatio);
01448                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_DECAY_LFRATIO, pEFXEAXReverb->flDecayLFRatio);
01449                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_REFLECTIONS_GAIN, pEFXEAXReverb->flReflectionsGain);
01450                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_REFLECTIONS_DELAY, pEFXEAXReverb->flReflectionsDelay);
01451                                 alEffectfv(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_REFLECTIONS_PAN, pEFXEAXReverb->flReflectionsPan);
01452                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_LATE_REVERB_GAIN, pEFXEAXReverb->flLateReverbGain);
01453                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_LATE_REVERB_DELAY, pEFXEAXReverb->flLateReverbDelay);
01454                                 alEffectfv(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_LATE_REVERB_PAN, pEFXEAXReverb->flLateReverbPan);
01455                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_ECHO_TIME, pEFXEAXReverb->flEchoTime);
01456                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_ECHO_DEPTH, pEFXEAXReverb->flEchoDepth);
01457                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_MODULATION_TIME, pEFXEAXReverb->flModulationTime);
01458                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_MODULATION_DEPTH, pEFXEAXReverb->flModulationDepth);
01459                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_AIR_ABSORPTION_GAINHF, pEFXEAXReverb->flAirAbsorptionGainHF);
01460                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_HFREFERENCE, pEFXEAXReverb->flHFReference);
01461                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_LFREFERENCE, pEFXEAXReverb->flLFReference);
01462                                 alEffectf(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_ROOM_ROLLOFF_FACTOR, pEFXEAXReverb->flRoomRolloffFactor);
01463                                 alEffecti(uiEffect, AL_EAXREVERB_DECAY_HFLIMIT, pEFXEAXReverb->iDecayHFLimit);
01464                         }
01465                         if (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR)
01466                                 return true;
01467                 }
01468 
01469                 return false;
01470         }
01471         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01472         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_attachEffectToSlot(ALuint slot, ALuint effect)
01473         {
01474                 if ( !hasEFXSupport() || slot==AL_NONE ) return false;
01475 
01476                 /* Attach Effect to Auxiliary Effect Slot */
01477                 /* slot is the ID of an Aux Effect Slot */
01478                 /* effect is the ID of an Effect */
01479                 alAuxiliaryEffectSloti(slot, AL_EFFECTSLOT_EFFECT, effect);
01480                 if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01481                 {
01482                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Cannot attach effect to slot!");
01483                         return false;
01484                 }
01485                 return true;
01486         }
01487         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01488         ALuint OgreOggSoundManager::_getEFXFilter(const std::string& fName)
01489         {
01490                 if ( mFilterList.empty() || !hasEFXSupport() || fName.empty() ) return AL_FILTER_NULL;
01491 
01492                 EffectList::iterator filter=mFilterList.find(fName);
01493                 if ( filter==mFilterList.end() )
01494                         return AL_FILTER_NULL;
01495                 else
01496                         return filter->second;
01497         }
01498 
01499         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01500         ALuint OgreOggSoundManager::_getEFXEffect(const std::string& eName)
01501         {
01502                 if ( mEffectList.empty() || !hasEFXSupport() || eName.empty() ) return AL_EFFECT_NULL;
01503 
01504                 EffectList::iterator effect=mEffectList.find(eName);
01505                 if ( effect==mEffectList.end() )
01506                         return AL_EFFECT_NULL;
01507                 else
01508                         return effect->second;
01509         }
01510 
01511         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01512         ALuint OgreOggSoundManager::_getEFXSlot(int slotID)
01513         {
01514                 if ( mEffectSlotList.empty() || !hasEFXSupport() || (slotID>=static_cast<int>(mEffectSlotList.size())) ) return AL_NONE;
01515 
01516                 return static_cast<ALuint>(mEffectSlotList[slotID]);
01517         }

01519         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01520         void OgreOggSoundManager::_determineAuxEffectSlots()
01521         {
01522                 ALuint          uiEffectSlots[128] = { 0 };
01523                 ALuint          uiEffects[1] = { 0 };
01524                 ALuint          uiFilters[1] = { 0 };
01525                 Ogre::String msg="";
01526 
01527                 // To determine how many Auxiliary Effects Slots are available, create as many as possible (up to 128)
01528                 // until the call fails.
01529                 for (mNumEffectSlots = 0; mNumEffectSlots < 128; mNumEffectSlots++)
01530                 {
01531                         alGenAuxiliaryEffectSlots(1, &uiEffectSlots[mNumEffectSlots]);
01532                         if (alGetError() != AL_NO_ERROR)
01533                                 break;
01534                 }
01535 
01536                 msg="*** --- "+Ogre::StringConverter::toString(mNumEffectSlots)+ " Auxiliary Effect Slot(s)";
01537                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01538 
01539                 // Retrieve the number of Auxiliary Effect Slots Sends available on each Source
01540                 alcGetIntegerv(mDevice, ALC_MAX_AUXILIARY_SENDS, 1, &mNumSendsPerSource);
01541                 msg="*** --- "+Ogre::StringConverter::toString(mNumSendsPerSource)+" Auxiliary Send(s) per Source";
01542                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01543 
01544                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- EFFECTS SUPPORTED:");
01545                 alGenEffects(1, &uiEffects[0]);
01546                 if (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR)
01547                 {
01548                         // Try setting Effect Type to known Effects
01549                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_REVERB);
01550                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_REVERB] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01551                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Reverb' Support: YES");
01552                         else
01553                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Reverb' Support: NO");
01554 
01555                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_EAXREVERB);
01556                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_EAXREVERB] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01557                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'EAX Reverb' Support: YES");
01558                         else
01559                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'EAX Reverb' Support: NO");
01560 
01561                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_CHORUS);
01562                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_CHORUS] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01563                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Chorus' Support: YES");
01564                         else
01565                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Chorus' Support: NO");
01566 
01567                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_DISTORTION);
01568                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_DISTORTION] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01569                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Distortion' Support: YES");
01570                         else
01571                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Distortion' Support: NO");
01572 
01573                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_ECHO);
01574                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_ECHO] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01575                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Echo' Support: YES");
01576                         else
01577                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Echo' Support: NO");
01578 
01579                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_FLANGER);
01580                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_FLANGER] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01581                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Flanger' Support: YES");
01582                         else
01583                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Flanger' Support: NO");
01584 
01585                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_FREQUENCY_SHIFTER);
01586                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_FREQUENCY_SHIFTER] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01587                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Frequency shifter' Support: YES");
01588                         else
01589                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Frequency shifter' Support: NO");
01590 
01591                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_VOCAL_MORPHER);
01592                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_VOCAL_MORPHER] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01593                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Vocal Morpher' Support: YES");
01594                         else
01595                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Vocal Morpher' Support: NO");
01596 
01597                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_PITCH_SHIFTER);
01598                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_PITCH_SHIFTER] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01599                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Pitch shifter' Support: YES");
01600                         else
01601                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Pitch shifter' Support: NO");
01602 
01603                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_RING_MODULATOR);
01604                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_RING_MODULATOR] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01605                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Ring modulator' Support: YES");
01606                         else
01607                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Ring modulator' Support: NO");
01608 
01609                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_AUTOWAH);
01610                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_AUTOWAH] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01611                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Autowah' Support: YES");
01612                         else
01613                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Autowah' Support: NO");
01614 
01615                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_COMPRESSOR);
01616                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_COMPRESSOR] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01617                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Compressor' Support: YES");
01618                         else
01619                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Compressor' Support: NO");
01620 
01621                         alEffecti(uiEffects[0], AL_EFFECT_TYPE, AL_EFFECT_EQUALIZER);
01622                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_EFFECT_EQUALIZER] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01623                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Equalizer' Support: YES");
01624                         else
01625                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Equalizer' Support: NO");
01626                 }
01627 
01628 
01629                 // To determine which Filters are supported, generate a Filter Object, and try to set its type to
01630                 // the various Filter enum values
01631                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- FILTERS SUPPORTED: ");
01632 
01633                 // Generate a Filter to use to determine what Filter Types are supported
01634                 alGenFilters(1, &uiFilters[0]);
01635                 if (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR)
01636                 {
01637                         // Try setting the Filter type to known Filters
01638                         alFilteri(uiFilters[0], AL_FILTER_TYPE, AL_FILTER_LOWPASS);
01639                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_FILTER_LOWPASS] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01640                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Low Pass' Support: YES");
01641                         else
01642                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Low Pass' Support: NO");
01643 
01644                         alFilteri(uiFilters[0], AL_FILTER_TYPE, AL_FILTER_HIGHPASS);
01645                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_FILTER_HIGHPASS] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01646                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'High Pass' Support: YES");
01647                         else
01648                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'High Pass' Support: NO");
01649 
01650                         alFilteri(uiFilters[0], AL_FILTER_TYPE, AL_FILTER_BANDPASS);
01651                         if ( mEFXSupportList[AL_FILTER_BANDPASS] = (alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR) )
01652                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Band Pass' Support: YES");
01653                         else
01654                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- 'Band Pass' Support: NO");
01655                 }
01656 
01657                 // Delete Filter
01658                 alDeleteFilters(1, &uiFilters[0]);
01659 
01660                 // Delete Effect
01661                 alDeleteEffects(1, &uiEffects[0]);
01662 
01663                 // Delete Auxiliary Effect Slots
01664                 alDeleteAuxiliaryEffectSlots(mNumEffectSlots, uiEffectSlots);
01665         }
01666         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01667         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_checkEFXSupport()
01668         {
01669                 if (alcIsExtensionPresent(mDevice, "ALC_EXT_EFX"))
01670                 {
01671                         // Get function pointers
01672                         alGenEffects = (LPALGENEFFECTS)alGetProcAddress("alGenEffects");
01673                         alDeleteEffects = (LPALDELETEEFFECTS )alGetProcAddress("alDeleteEffects");
01674                         alIsEffect = (LPALISEFFECT )alGetProcAddress("alIsEffect");
01675                         alEffecti = (LPALEFFECTI)alGetProcAddress("alEffecti");
01676                         alEffectiv = (LPALEFFECTIV)alGetProcAddress("alEffectiv");
01677                         alEffectf = (LPALEFFECTF)alGetProcAddress("alEffectf");
01678                         alEffectfv = (LPALEFFECTFV)alGetProcAddress("alEffectfv");
01679                         alGetEffecti = (LPALGETEFFECTI)alGetProcAddress("alGetEffecti");
01680                         alGetEffectiv = (LPALGETEFFECTIV)alGetProcAddress("alGetEffectiv");
01681                         alGetEffectf = (LPALGETEFFECTF)alGetProcAddress("alGetEffectf");
01682                         alGetEffectfv = (LPALGETEFFECTFV)alGetProcAddress("alGetEffectfv");
01683                         alGenFilters = (LPALGENFILTERS)alGetProcAddress("alGenFilters");
01684                         alDeleteFilters = (LPALDELETEFILTERS)alGetProcAddress("alDeleteFilters");
01685                         alIsFilter = (LPALISFILTER)alGetProcAddress("alIsFilter");
01686                         alFilteri = (LPALFILTERI)alGetProcAddress("alFilteri");
01687                         alFilteriv = (LPALFILTERIV)alGetProcAddress("alFilteriv");
01688                         alFilterf = (LPALFILTERF)alGetProcAddress("alFilterf");
01689                         alFilterfv = (LPALFILTERFV)alGetProcAddress("alFilterfv");
01690                         alGetFilteri = (LPALGETFILTERI )alGetProcAddress("alGetFilteri");
01691                         alGetFilteriv= (LPALGETFILTERIV )alGetProcAddress("alGetFilteriv");
01692                         alGetFilterf = (LPALGETFILTERF )alGetProcAddress("alGetFilterf");
01693                         alGetFilterfv= (LPALGETFILTERFV )alGetProcAddress("alGetFilterfv");
01694                         alGenAuxiliaryEffectSlots = (LPALGENAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTS)alGetProcAddress("alGenAuxiliaryEffectSlots");
01695                         alDeleteAuxiliaryEffectSlots = (LPALDELETEAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTS)alGetProcAddress("alDeleteAuxiliaryEffectSlots");
01696                         alIsAuxiliaryEffectSlot = (LPALISAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOT)alGetProcAddress("alIsAuxiliaryEffectSlot");
01697                         alAuxiliaryEffectSloti = (LPALAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTI)alGetProcAddress("alAuxiliaryEffectSloti");
01698                         alAuxiliaryEffectSlotiv = (LPALAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTIV)alGetProcAddress("alAuxiliaryEffectSlotiv");
01699                         alAuxiliaryEffectSlotf = (LPALAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTF)alGetProcAddress("alAuxiliaryEffectSlotf");
01700                         alAuxiliaryEffectSlotfv = (LPALAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTFV)alGetProcAddress("alAuxiliaryEffectSlotfv");
01701                         alGetAuxiliaryEffectSloti = (LPALGETAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTI)alGetProcAddress("alGetAuxiliaryEffectSloti");
01702                         alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotiv = (LPALGETAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTIV)alGetProcAddress("alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotiv");
01703                         alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotf = (LPALGETAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTF)alGetProcAddress("alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotf");
01704                         alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotfv = (LPALGETAUXILIARYEFFECTSLOTFV)alGetProcAddress("alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotfv");
01705 
01706                         if (alGenEffects &&     alDeleteEffects && alIsEffect && alEffecti && alEffectiv &&     alEffectf &&
01707                                 alEffectfv && alGetEffecti && alGetEffectiv && alGetEffectf && alGetEffectfv && alGenFilters &&
01708                                 alDeleteFilters && alIsFilter && alFilteri && alFilteriv &&     alFilterf && alFilterfv &&
01709                                 alGetFilteri && alGetFilteriv && alGetFilterf && alGetFilterfv && alGenAuxiliaryEffectSlots &&
01710                                 alDeleteAuxiliaryEffectSlots && alIsAuxiliaryEffectSlot && alAuxiliaryEffectSloti &&
01711                                 alAuxiliaryEffectSlotiv && alAuxiliaryEffectSlotf && alAuxiliaryEffectSlotfv &&
01712                                 alGetAuxiliaryEffectSloti && alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotiv && alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotf &&
01713                                 alGetAuxiliaryEffectSlotfv)
01714                                 return true;
01715                 }
01716 
01717                 return false;
01718         }
