01720         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01721         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_checkXRAMSupport()
01722         {
01723                 // Check for X-RAM extension
01724                 if(alIsExtensionPresent("EAX-RAM") == AL_TRUE)
01725                 {
01726                         // Get X-RAM Function pointers
01727                         mEAXSetBufferMode = (EAXSetBufferMode)alGetProcAddress("EAXSetBufferMode");
01728                         mEAXGetBufferMode = (EAXGetBufferMode)alGetProcAddress("EAXGetBufferMode");
01729 
01730                         if (mEAXSetBufferMode && mEAXGetBufferMode)
01731                         {
01732                                 mXRamSize = alGetEnumValue("AL_EAX_RAM_SIZE");
01733                                 mXRamFree = alGetEnumValue("AL_EAX_RAM_FREE");
01734                                 mXRamAuto = alGetEnumValue("AL_STORAGE_AUTOMATIC");
01735                                 mXRamHardware = alGetEnumValue("AL_STORAGE_HARDWARE");
01736                                 mXRamAccessible = alGetEnumValue("AL_STORAGE_ACCESSIBLE");
01737 
01738                                 if (mXRamSize && mXRamFree && mXRamAuto && mXRamHardware && mXRamAccessible)
01739                                 {
01740                                         // Support available
01741                                         mXRamSizeMB = alGetInteger(mXRamSize) / (1024*1024);
01742                                         mXRamFreeMB = alGetInteger(mXRamFree) / (1024*1024);
01743                                         return true;
01744                                 }
01745                         }
01746                 }
01747                 return false;
01748         }
01749         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01750         void OgreOggSoundManager::_loadSoundImpl(OgreOggISound* sound, const Ogre::String& file, ALuint buf, bool prebuffer)
01751         {
01752                 if ( !sound ) return;
01753 
01754                 // Use shared buffer if available
01755                 sound->_openImpl(file, buf);
01756 
01757                 // If requested to preBuffer - grab free source and init
01758                 if (prebuffer)
01759                 {
01760                         if ( !_requestSoundSource(sound) )
01761                         {
01762                                 Ogre::String msg="*** OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Failed to preBuffer sound: "+sound->getName();
01763                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01764                         }
01765                 }
01766         }
01767         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01768         void OgreOggSoundManager::_loadSoundImpl(OgreOggISound* sound, Ogre::DataStreamPtr& stream, bool prebuffer)
01769         {
01770                 if ( !sound ) return;
01771 
01772                 // Load audio file
01773                 sound->_openImpl(stream);
01774         
01775                 // If requested to preBuffer - grab free source and init
01776                 if (prebuffer)
01777                 {
01778                         if ( !_requestSoundSource(sound) )
01779                         {
01780                                 Ogre::String msg="*** OgreOggSoundManager::createSound() - Failed to preBuffer sound: "+sound->getName();
01781                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01782                         }
01783                 }
01784         }
01785         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01786         void OgreOggSoundManager::_removeFromLists(OgreOggSound::OgreOggISound *sound)
01787         {
01788                 // Remove from reactivate list
01789                 if ( !mSoundsToReactivate.empty() )
01790                 {
01791                         // Remove ALL referneces to this sound..
01792                         for ( ActiveList::iterator iter=mSoundsToReactivate.begin(); iter!=mSoundsToReactivate.end(); )
01793                         {
01794                                 if ( sound==(*iter) )
01795                                         mSoundsToReactivate.erase(iter);
01796                                 else
01797                                         ++iter;
01798                         }
01799                 }
01800 
01803                 if ( !mPausedSounds.empty() )
01804                 {
01805                         // Remove ALL referneces to this sound..
01806                         for ( ActiveList::iterator iter=mPausedSounds.begin(); iter!=mPausedSounds.end(); )
01807                         {
01808                                 if ( sound==(*iter) )
01809                                         mPausedSounds.erase(iter);
01810                                 else
01811                                         ++iter;
01812                         }
01813                 }       
01816                 if ( !mActiveSounds.empty() )
01817                 {
01818                         // Remove ALL referneces to this sound..
01819                         for ( ActiveList::iterator iter=mActiveSounds.begin(); iter!=mActiveSounds.end(); )
01820                         {
01821                                 if ( sound==(*iter) )
01822                                         mActiveSounds.erase(iter);
01823                                 else
01824                                         ++iter;
01825                         }
01826                 }       
01827         }
01828         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01829         void OgreOggSoundManager::_releaseSoundImpl(OgreOggISound* sound)
01830         {
01831                 if (!sound) return;
01832 
01833                 // Delete sound buffer
01834                 ALuint src = sound->getSource();
01835                 if ( src!=AL_NONE ) _releaseSoundSource(sound);
01836 
01837                 // Remove references from lists
01838                 _removeFromLists(sound);
01839 
01840                 // Delete sound 
01841                 OGRE_DELETE_T(sound, OgreOggISound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
01842         }
01843         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01844         void OgreOggSoundManager::_destroySoundImpl(OgreOggISound* sound)
01845         {
01846                 if ( !sound ) return;
01847 
01848                 // Find sound in map
01849                 SoundMap::iterator i = mSoundMap.find(sound->getName());
01850 
01851                 // If created via plugin call destroyMovableObject() which will call _destroy()
01852                 if (sound->mScnMan)
01853                         sound->mScnMan->destroyMovableObject(sound->getName(), OgreOggSoundFactory::FACTORY_TYPE_NAME);
01854                 // else call _destroy() directly
01855                 else
01856                         _releaseSoundImpl(sound);
01857         
01858                 if (i != mSoundMap.end())
01859                 {
01860                         // Remove from map
01861                         mSoundMap.erase(i);
01862                 }
01863         }
01864         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01865         void OgreOggSoundManager::_checkFeatureSupport()
01866         {
01867                 Ogre::String msg="";
01868                 // Supported Formats Info
01869                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- SUPPORTED FORMATS");
01870                 ALenum eBufferFormat = 0;
01871                 eBufferFormat = alcGetEnumValue(mDevice, "AL_FORMAT_MONO16");
01872                 if(eBufferFormat)
01873                 {
01874                         msg="*** --- AL_FORMAT_MONO16 -- Monophonic Sound";
01875                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01876                 }
01877                 eBufferFormat = alcGetEnumValue(mDevice, "AL_FORMAT_STEREO16");
01878                 if(eBufferFormat)
01879                 {
01880                         msg="*** --- AL_FORMAT_STEREO16 -- Stereo Sound";
01881                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01882                 }
01883                 eBufferFormat = alcGetEnumValue(mDevice, "AL_FORMAT_QUAD16");
01884                 if(eBufferFormat)
01885                 {
01886                         msg="*** --- AL_FORMAT_QUAD16 -- 4 Channel Sound";
01887                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01888                 }
01889                 eBufferFormat = alcGetEnumValue(mDevice, "AL_FORMAT_51CHN16");
01890                 if(eBufferFormat)
01891                 {
01892                         msg="*** --- AL_FORMAT_51CHN16 -- 5.1 Surround Sound";
01893                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01894                 }
01895                 eBufferFormat = alcGetEnumValue(mDevice, "AL_FORMAT_61CHN16");
01896                 if(eBufferFormat)
01897                 {
01898                         msg="*** --- AL_FORMAT_61CHN16 -- 6.1 Surround Sound";
01899                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01900                 }
01901                 eBufferFormat = alcGetEnumValue(mDevice, "AL_FORMAT_71CHN16");
01902                 if(eBufferFormat)
01903                 {
01904                         msg="*** --- AL_FORMAT_71CHN16 -- 7.1 Surround Sound";
01905                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(msg);
01906                 }
01907 
01908 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
01909                 // EFX
01910                 mEFXSupport = _checkEFXSupport();
01911                 if (mEFXSupport)
01912                 {
01913                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- EFX Detected");
01914                         _determineAuxEffectSlots();
01915                 }
01916                 else
01917                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- EFX NOT Detected");
01918 
01919                 // XRAM
01920                 mXRamSupport = _checkXRAMSupport();
01921                 if (mXRamSupport)
01922                 {
01923                         // Log message
01924                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- X-RAM Detected");
01925                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- X-RAM Size(MB): " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(mXRamSizeMB) +
01926                                 " Free(MB):" + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(mXRamFreeMB));
01927                 }
01928                 else
01929                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- XRAM NOT Detected");
01930 
01931                 // EAX
01932                 for(int version = 5; version >= 2; version--)
01933                 {
01934                         Ogre::String eaxName="EAX"+Ogre::StringConverter::toString(version)+".0";
01935                         if(alIsExtensionPresent(eaxName.c_str()) == AL_TRUE)
01936                         {
01937                                 mEAXSupport = true;
01938                                 mEAXVersion = version;
01939                                 eaxName="*** --- EAX "+Ogre::StringConverter::toString(version)+".0 Detected";
01940                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(eaxName);
01941                                 break;
01942                         }
01943                 }
01944 #endif
01945         }

01952         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
01953         void OgreOggSoundManager::_releaseAll()
01954         {
01955                 // Destroy all sounds
01956                 SoundMap::iterator i = mSoundMap.begin();
01957                 while(i != mSoundMap.end())
01958                 {
01959                         OGRE_DELETE_T(i->second, OgreOggISound, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
01960                         ++i;
01961                 }
01962 
01963                 mSoundMap.clear();
01964                 // Delete sources
01965                 SourceList::iterator it = mSourcePool.begin();
01966                 while (it != mSourcePool.end())
01967                 {
01968                         if ( hasEFXSupport() )
01969                         {
01970 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
01971                                 // Remove filters/effects
01972                                 alSourcei(static_cast<ALuint>((*it)), AL_DIRECT_FILTER, AL_FILTER_NULL);
01973                                 alSource3i(static_cast<ALuint>((*it)), AL_AUXILIARY_SEND_FILTER, AL_EFFECTSLOT_NULL, 0, AL_FILTER_NULL);
01974 #endif
01975 
01976                         }
01977                         alDeleteSources(1,&(*it));
01978                         ++it;
01979                 }
01980 
01981                 mSourcePool.clear();
01982                 // Shared buffers
01983                 SharedBufferList::iterator b = mSharedBuffers.begin();
01984                 while (b != mSharedBuffers.end())
01985                 {
01986                         if ( b->second->mRefCount>0 )
01987                                 alDeleteBuffers(1, &b->second->mAudioBuffer);
01988                         OGRE_FREE(b->second, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
01989                         ++b;
01990                 }
01991 
01992                 mSharedBuffers.clear();
01993 
01994 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
01995                 // clear EFX effect lists
01996                 if ( !mFilterList.empty() )
01997                 {
01998                         EffectList::iterator iter=mFilterList.begin();
01999                         for ( ; iter!=mFilterList.end(); ++iter )
02000                             alDeleteEffects( 1, &iter->second);
02001                         mFilterList.clear();
02002                 }
02003 
02004                 if ( !mEffectList.empty() )
02005                 {
02006                         EffectList::iterator iter=mEffectList.begin();
02007                         for ( ; iter!=mEffectList.end(); ++iter )
02008                             alDeleteEffects( 1, &iter->second);
02009                         mEffectList.clear();
02010                 }
02011 
02012                 if ( !mEffectSlotList.empty() )
02013                 {
02014                         SourceList::iterator iter=mEffectSlotList.begin();
02015                         for ( ; iter!=mEffectSlotList.end(); ++iter )
02016                             alDeleteEffects( 1, &(*iter));
02017                         mEffectSlotList.clear();
02018                 }
02019 #endif
02020         }
02021         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02022         int OgreOggSoundManager::_createSourcePool()
02023         {
02024                 ALuint source;
02025                 unsigned int numSources = 0;
02026 
02027                 while(alGetError() == AL_NO_ERROR && numSources < mMaxSources)
02028                 {
02029                         source = 0;
02030                         alGenSources(1,&source);
02031                         if(source != 0)
02032                         {
02033                                 mSourcePool.push_back(source);
02034                                 numSources++;
02035                         }
02036                         else
02037                         {
02038                                 alGetError();
02039                                 break;
02040                         }
02041                 }
02042 
02043                 return static_cast<int>(mSourcePool.size());
02044         }
02045         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02046         void OgreOggSoundManager::_reactivateQueuedSoundsImpl()
02047         {
02048                 // Any sounds to re-activate?
02049                 if (mSoundsToReactivate.empty()) return;
02050 
02051                 // Sort list by distance
02052                 std::sort(mSoundsToReactivate.begin(), mSoundsToReactivate.end(), _sortNearToFar());
02053 
02054                 // Get sound object from front of list
02055                 OgreOggISound* snd = mSoundsToReactivate.front();
02056 
02057                 // Check sound hasn't been stopped whilst in list
02058                 if ( snd->isPlaying() )
02059                 {
02060                         // Try to request a source for sound
02061                         if (_requestSoundSource(snd))
02062                         {
02063                                 // play sound
02064                                 snd->play();
02065                         }
02066                 }
02067                 // Else - kick off list
02068                 else
02069                 {
02070                         mSoundsToReactivate.erase(mSoundsToReactivate.begin());
02071                 }
02072         }
02073         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02074         void OgreOggSoundManager::_reactivateQueuedSounds()
02075         {
02076 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
02077                 SoundAction action;
02078                 action.mAction  = LQ_REACTIVATE;
02079                 action.mParams  = 0;
02080                 action.mSound   = 0;
02081                 _requestSoundAction(action);
02082 #else
02083                 _reactivateQueuedSoundsImpl();
02084 #endif
02085         }
02086         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02087         ALuint OgreOggSoundManager::_getSharedBuffer(const String& sName)
02088         {
02089                 if ( sName.empty() ) return AL_NONE;
02090 
02091                 SharedBufferList::iterator f;
02092                 if ( ( f = mSharedBuffers.find(sName) ) != mSharedBuffers.end() )
02093                 {
02094                         f->second->mRefCount++;
02095                         return f->second->mAudioBuffer;
02096                 }
02097                 return AL_NONE;
02098         }
02099 
02100         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02101         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_releaseSharedBuffer(const String& sName, ALuint& buffer)
02102         {
02103                 if ( sName.empty() ) return false;
02104 
02105                 SharedBufferList::iterator f;
02106                 if ( ( f = mSharedBuffers.find(sName) ) != mSharedBuffers.end() )
02107                 {
02108                         // Is it sharing buffer?
02109                         if ( buffer == f->second->mAudioBuffer )
02110                         {
02111                                 // Decrement
02112                                 f->second->mRefCount--;
02113                                 if ( f->second->mRefCount==0 )
02114                                 {
02115                                         // Delete buffer object
02116                                         alDeleteBuffers(1, &f->second->mAudioBuffer);
02117 
02118                                         // Delete struct
02119                                         OGRE_FREE(f->second, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
02120 
02121                                         // Remove from list
02122                                         mSharedBuffers.erase(f);
02123                                 }
02124                                 return true;
02125                         }
02126                 }
02127                 return false;
02128         }
02129 
02130         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02131         bool OgreOggSoundManager::_registerSharedBuffer(const String& sName, ALuint& buffer)
02132         {
02133                 if ( sName.empty() ) return false;
02134 
02135                 SharedBufferList::iterator f;
02136                 if ( ( f = mSharedBuffers.find(sName) ) == mSharedBuffers.end() )
02137                 {
02138                         // Create struct
02139                         sharedAudioBuffer* buf = OGRE_ALLOC_T(sharedAudioBuffer, 1, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
02140 
02141                         // Set buffer
02142                         buf->mAudioBuffer = buffer;
02143 
02144                         // Set ref count
02145                         buf->mRefCount = 1;
02146 
02147                         // Add to list
02148                         mSharedBuffers[sName] = buf;
02149                 }
02150                 return true;
02151         }
02152 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
02153         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02154         void OgreOggSoundManager::_updateBuffers()
02155         {
02156                 ActiveList::const_iterator i = mActiveSounds.begin();
02157                 while( i != mActiveSounds.end())
02158                 {
02159                         (*i)->_updateAudioBuffers();
02160                         // Update recorder
02161                         if ( mRecorder ) mRecorder->_updateRecording();
02162                         ++i;
02163                 }

02165         void OgreOggSoundManager::_requestSoundAction(const SoundAction& action)
02166         {
02167                 if ( !mActionsList ) return;
02168 
02169                 mActionsList->push(action);
02170         }
02171         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
02172         void OgreOggSoundManager::_processQueuedSounds()
02173         {
02174                 if ( !mActionsList ) return;
02175 
02176                 SoundAction act;
02177                 int i=0;
02178                 while ( ((i++)<5) && mActionsList->pop(act) )
02179                 {
02180                         switch ( act.mAction )
02181                         {
02182                         case LQ_PLAY:                   { act.mSound->_playImpl(); }            break;
02183                         case LQ_PAUSE:                  { act.mSound->_pauseImpl();     }               break;
02184                         case LQ_STOP:                   { act.mSound->_stopImpl();      }               break;
02185                         case LQ_DESTROY:                { _destroySoundImpl(act.mSound); }      break;
02186                         case LQ_DESTROY_ALL:    { _destroyAllSoundsImpl(); }            break;
02187                         case LQ_STOP_ALL:               { _stopAllSoundsImpl(); }                       break;
02188                         case LQ_PAUSE_ALL:              { _pauseAllSoundsImpl(); }                      break;
02189                         case LQ_RESUME_ALL:             { _resumeAllPausedSoundsImpl(); }       break;
02190                         case LQ_LOAD:
02191                                 {
02192                                         cSound* c = static_cast<cSound*>(act.mParams);
02193                                         if ( c->mBuffer!=AL_NONE )
02194                                                 _loadSoundImpl(act.mSound, c->mFileName, c->mBuffer, c->mPrebuffer);
02195                                         else
02196                                                 _loadSoundImpl(act.mSound, c->mStream, c->mPrebuffer);
02197 
02198                                         // Cleanup..
02199                                         c->mStream.setNull();
02200 
02201                                         // Delete
02202                                         OGRE_FREE(c, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
02203                                 }
02204                                 break;
02205                         }
02206                 }
02207         }
02208 #endif
